author: mrdylanroberts
name: RoleCleanup
short: Automatically manages roles based on reactions in specified channels.
description: This cog listens for reactions in a welcome channel to assign a 'ROLE_SELECTOR' role, and listens for reactions in a role selection channel to remove 'GUEST' and 'ROLE_SELECTOR' roles. Channel IDs and role names should be configured.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any end user data.
